card.name: Battle of Wits
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.property: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are incubated by swamp gases and cut their teeth on zombie flesh. Serpent warriors are not to be trifled with.

card.name: Mana Clash
card.property: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

card.name: Paladin en-Vec
card.property: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)

card.name: Death Pits of Rath
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits—that the sudden extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan." —Edgar Allan Poe, "The Pit and the Pendulum"

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

card.name: Evacuation
card.property: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is more unsettling: the roar of battle or the silence that follows?

card.name: Tree Monkey
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vines and branches of the jungle canopy are all the wings it needs.

card.name: Booby Trap
card.property: As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, choose an opponent and a card name other than a basic land card name. The chosen player reveals each card they draw. When the chosen player draws a card with the chosen name, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

card.name: Karplusan Yeti
card.property: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.

card.name: Guerrilla Tactics
card.property: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.property: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

card.name: Might of Oaks
card.property: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Crafty Pathmage
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the pathmage —Otarian expression meaning "escape quickly"

card.name: Worship
card.property: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol." —Serra

card.name: Sanctum Guardian
card.property: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Sandstone Warrior
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) {R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

card.name: Force of Nature
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Archivist
card.property: {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sit down and read. Educate yourself for the coming conflicts." —Mary Harris "Mother" Jones

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once I saw a goblin shouting at a thunderstorm. He lost the argument pretty quickly." —Wandering mage

card.name: Aladdin's Ring
card.property: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good lamp will light your way. A good ring will clear it." —Nervan, royal jeweler

card.name: Bog Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bodies of its victims are the only tracks it leaves.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

card.name: Flowstone Crusher
card.property: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's better than smashing things with a rock? A rock that gets up and smashes things for you." —Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

card.name: Crossbow Infantry
card.property: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He can split a marshfly in two from halfway across the range." —Onean sergeant

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

card.name: Infantry Veteran
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This scar? From a zombie's teeth. This scar? From a barbarian's axe. That scar? I don't talk about that one."

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

card.name: Yawgmoth Demon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you don't, tap Yawgmoth Demon and it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Imaginary Pet
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have a card in hand, return Imaginary Pet to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It followed me home. Can I keep it?"

card.name: Goblin King
card.property: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Thran Golem
card.property: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a beaver's teeth grow unchecked without regular use, so does the golem's armor grow without regular battles.

card.name: Boiling Seas
card.property: Destroy all Islands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What burns the land, boils the seas.

card.name: Defense Grid
card.property: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lights up the sky, beckoning enemies only to repel them.

card.name: Blinking Spirit
card.property: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!" —Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

card.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
card.property: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They patched the holes, loaded their sharpest rocks, spanked their children one last time, and lurched off into the sunset.

card.name: Sage Aven
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Sage Aven enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Web
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Silklash Spider
card.property: Reach {X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing that flies over the Krosan Forest is the wind.

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of all I that I have lost, I miss my mind the most."

card.name: Mortivore
card.property: Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the air burns, only death breathes deep." —Bogardan mage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

card.name: Shard Phoenix
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four, Dunno how to count no more."

card.name: Lightning Elemental
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." —William Knox, "Mortality"

card.name: Warrior's Honor
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave." —Calvin Coolidge

card.name: Rukh Egg
card.property: When Rukh Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

card.name: Skyhunter Prowler
card.property: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Azure Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little dreamt could seem so cruel As waiting for the wings outspread, The jagged teeth, the burning eyes, And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His peers derive knowledge from ancient tomes locked within dark spires. He finds knowledge within the solitude of a lifetime spent watching the Quicksilver Sea.

card.name: Treetop Bracers
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But high she shoots through air and light, Above all low delay, Where nothing earthly bounds her flight, Nor shadow dims her way." —Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

card.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Hell's Caretaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Overgrowth
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.property: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Bog Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Telepathy
card.property: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Needle Storm
card.property: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rain is driven like nails.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.property: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Honor Guard
card.property: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

card.name: Peace of Mind
card.property: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What can a peasant get for free that an emperor can never buy?" —Dal riddle

card.name: Execute
card.property: Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool who would die for honor is better off dead." —Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't think. It doesn't feel. It doesn't laugh or cry. All it does from dusk till dawn Is make the soldiers die. —Onean children's rhyme

card.name: Gift of Estates
card.property: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Spineless Thug
card.property: Spineless Thug can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

card.name: Wurm's Tooth
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.property: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired doesn't even begin to cover it.

card.name: Looming Shade
card.property: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan" —Wandering mage

card.name: Whip Sergeant
card.property: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon soldiers learn to move faster than the whip.

card.name: Plagiarize
card.property: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Rathi Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.

card.name: Nekrataal
card.property: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Sift
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

card.name: Llanowar Wastes
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Rogue Kavu
card.property: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every litter of kavu yields one cub that refuses to hunt with the pack.

card.name: Temporal Adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If yesterday was two days ago tomorrow, will the day after tomorrow be today or yesterday?" —Temporal Manipulation 101 final exam, Tolarian Academy

card.name: Slay
card.property: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

card.name: Giant Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Watching the spider's web —Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

card.name: Howling Mine
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

card.name: Viridian Shaman
card.property: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She stands as a living symbol of the natural world and an enemy of the forces that threaten it.

card.name: Treasure Trove

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth means power; the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade." —Emma Goldman, "Anarchism"

card.name: Ancient Silverback
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Blaze
card.property: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

card.name: Sea Monster
card.property: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

card.name: Final Punishment
card.property: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to that player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pain of a lifetime—every scrape, illness, and bruise—condensed into a single moment.

card.name: Daring Apprentice
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

card.name: Righteousness
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the greatest strength is the strength of conviction.

card.name: Stream of Life
card.property: Target player gains X life.

card.name: Ley Druid
card.property: {T}: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of training, the druid becomes one with nature, drawing power from the land and returning it when needed.

card.name: Elvish Berserker
card.property: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My brother, it may now be time to ring the bell and put out the call for aid."

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

card.name: Remove Soul
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When your enemies are denied soldiers, they are denied victory.

card.name: Sacred Ground
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knight knelt and prayed, first for the sanctity of his land and second for the strength to repel its invaders.

card.name: Spellbook
card.property: You have no maximum hand size.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again." —Karn, silver golem

card.name: Ogre Taskmaster
card.property: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

card.name: Jester's Cap
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

card.name: Wrath of God
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Blanchwood Armor
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

card.name: Biorhythm
card.property: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen life's purpose, and now it is my own." —Kamahl, druid acolyte

card.name: Puppeteer
card.property: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Getting people to do what you want is merely a matter of telling them what they want to hear."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the snowy slopes of Kaelor, To the canyons of Bandu, We drink and fight and feast and die As we were born to do." —Balduvian tavern song

card.name: Marble Titan
card.property: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It entered the temple with all the pomp and decorum of a rock hitting a goblin's skull.

card.name: Gluttonous Zombie
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

card.name: Demolish
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pound the steel until it fits. Doesn't work? Bash to bits." —Dwarven forging song

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

card.name: Chastise
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens." —Mystic elder

card.name: Mogg Sentry
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing makes a mogg madder than having to wake up.

card.name: Trade Routes
card.property: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand. {1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise, the righteous, the mighty—the merchant feeds them all.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes
card.property: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Thought Courier
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's an assortment to satisfy all your needs: deep, fleeting, dirty, pure, scientific, philosophical, after, and even fore. For a price."

card.name: Foul Imp

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

card.name: Leonin Skyhunter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

card.name: Tidal Kraken
card.property: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

card.name: Beast of Burden
card.property: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though it was built as an instrument of labor, it wasn't long before it became an instrument of war.

card.name: Bloodfire Colossus
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

card.name: Flight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

card.property: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was a crack of branches, a rustle of leaves, then a tremendous roar. Our party had no chance as death descended from above." —Taseen, elvish bard

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

card.name: Groundskeeper
card.property: {1} {G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soldiers speak of defending the soil, but they care only for their nations. I care nothing for their nations and everything for the soil."

card.name: Jade Statue
card.property: {2}: Jade Statue becomes a 3/6 Golem artifact creature until end of combat. Activate this ability only during combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The paradox of jade statues is that their victims never really expect attack, but they are never completely surprised either." —Kabel, Tolarian archivist

card.name: Royal Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

card.name: Reverse Damage
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enemy's hatred is his weakness. My enemy's anger is my strength." —Remin, venerable monk

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The College of Lat-Nam is often forced to expel students whose experiments grow too risky or too cruel.

card.name: Tidings
card.property: Draw four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though the letter was many pages long, I could tell all I needed to know from one look at the messenger's face." —Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Ivory Mask
card.property: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made from its wearer's hopes, the mask ensures that those hopes will be fulfilled.

card.name: Enfeeblement
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it." —Kaervek

card.name: Natural Affinity
card.property: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

card.name: Swarm of Rats
card.property: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rats, rats, rats! Hundreds, thousands, millions of them, and every one a life." —Bram Stoker, Dracula

card.name: Seething Song
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The purest ore is produced from the hottest furnace, and the brightest thunder-bolt is elicited from the darkest storm." —Charles Colton

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

card.name: Drudge Skeletons
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." —Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

card.name: Sacred Nectar
card.property: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Over the silver mountains, Where spring the nectar fountains, There will I kiss The bowl of bliss; And drink my everlasting fill. . . ." —Sir Walter Raleigh, "The Pilgrimage"

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better." —Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

card.name: Levitation
card.property: Creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin's pride in his apprentice was diminished somewhat when he had to get the others back down.

card.name: Nightmare
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

card.name: Magnivore
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.) Magnivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of sorcery cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.property: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

card.name: Enrage
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barbarians call it "touching the soul of the dragon."

card.name: Panic Attack
card.property: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

card.name: Kraken's Eye
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

card.name: River Bear
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

card.name: Inspirit
card.property: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hour of your redemption is here. . . . Rally to me. . . . rise and strike. Strike at every favorable opportunity. For your homes and hearths, strike!" —General Douglas MacArthur, to the people of the Philippines

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

card.name: Llanowar Behemoth
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.property: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Zodiac Monkey
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lives mainly on fruit, leaves, and the occasional nose.

card.name: Baleful Stare
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though there is little to be learned from your dust and stones, I shall wring them dry nevertheless."

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.property: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are as many pillows of illusion as flakes in a snow-storm. We wake from one dream into another dream." —Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusions"

card.name: Elvish Bard
card.property: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Helplessly drawn in, the bard's enemies quickly find there's more than song to be found.

card.name: Pegasus Charger
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Natural Spring
card.property: Target player gains 8 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

card.name: Holy Day
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The day of Spirits; my soul's calm retreat / Which none disturb!" —Henry Vaughan, "The Night"

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, it also makes a very nice flower pot. . . ." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

card.name: Fleeting Image
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow." —Aesop, Fables, trans. Jacobs

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

card.name: Storage Matrix
card.property: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during their untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

card.name: Thundermare
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.) When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hooves strike lightning and the thunder follows quickly after.

card.name: Withering Gaze
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature cares not for the knowledge to be gained from its study. Better to bleed it dry, lest its potential be wasted on lizards and leaves."

card.name: Dream Prowler
card.property: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think that some find sleep a restful state." —Volrath

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The song of the forest is in perfect harmony. If a single note is out of place, the elves will find its source.

card.name: Plague Beetle
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows whether they were named for the disease they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

card.name: Ornithopter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my honor to improve on the Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work." —Urza, in his apprenticeship

card.name: Blackmail
card.property: Target player reveals three cards from their hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In addition to killing peasants, punishing subordinates, and raising an army of nightmares, Braids somehow found time for her favorite hobby: petty extortion.

card.name: Story Circle
card.property: As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color. {W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Disrupting Scepter
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True power is controlling not only the hearts of your subjects, but their minds as well."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair." —Jules Verne, Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea, trans. Lewis

card.name: Samite Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

card.name: Master Decoy
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

card.name: Cruel Edict
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No mockeries now for them; no prayers nor bells, / Nor any voice of mourning save the choirs,— / The shrill, demented choirs of wailing shells." —Wilfred Owen, "Anthem for Doomed Youth"

card.name: Aven Windreader
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

card.name: Rod of Ruin
card.property: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.property: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

card.name: King Cheetah
card.property: Flash

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a king cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend. —Suq'Ata wisdom

card.name: Utopia Tree
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fruit of this fabled tree takes on the flavor of whatever food you love most.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.property: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy." —Keld Triumphant

card.name: Ur-Golem's Eye
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It still stares accusingly at Memnarch, though millennia have passed since he separated the eye from its body.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.property: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gambling with mages never is." —Remin, venerable monk

card.name: Persecute
card.property: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of all the tyrannies on humane kind The worst is that which persecutes the mind." —John Dryden, "The Hind and the Panther"
